item.description:
Specific Topic: Gathering and Utilizing Internal Resources

Learn how you can gather up all the internal resources you need in any moment.

Have you ever had an important event approaching and you just did not feel up to par - you were anxious, nervous, tired, or just unfocussed and you wish you could change your state?  Well, come learn how you can do this with some simple techniques.

  • Learn how to properly bring up resourceful states that you can use
  • Learn how to anchor for use anytime
  • Learn the Tony Robbins "Power Move"!

Come learn techniques that you can apply right now!

Come Learn and Play!!

 


Our Monthly Hypnosis/NLP Meetup in Methuen. Learn/Experience/Share techniques and strategies to help yourself or others overcome fears, phobias, negative emotions, illnesses, and many others, as well as to become the person you always wanted to be.

Kevin Martin 866.837.2133 kenda_assoc@msn.com www.poseffects.com

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Methuen - Gathering and Utilizing Internal Resources
